doc.title: 360 grados en torno a Marisol
doc.plot: A complete program focused on Marisol's musical career. She is joined by many friends who perform comical sketches or their own music songs. Marisol sings her recent singles, international hits such as "Everybody's talking" and also some of her most classical and famous songs, like "Cabriola" or "Corazón Contento".
